sentences.en: About 70% of the cocoa acreage is treated with insecticide.
sentences.cn: 大约70%的可可树林地喷过杀虫剂。

sentences.en: Approximately 40 % of the applied insecticide in each orchard was residual in the soil profiles.
sentences.cn: 大约每一果园施用的40%杀虫剂残留在土壤剖面中.

sentences.en: As preventive, spray plants with systemic insecticide or fumigate them regularly.
sentences.cn: 作为预防措施, 要用内吸杀虫剂对植物定期喷洒,或熏蒸.

sentences.en: He sprayed an insecticide upon the plants to kill the insects.
sentences.cn: 他给作物喷药,以杀死害虫.

sentences.en: I was in the most unbelievable snarl this morning over - of all things - a truckload of insecticide!
sentences.cn: 今天早上,真想不到,为了一卡车杀虫剂的事搞得我晕头转向!

sentences.en: Many pests are resistant to the insecticide.
sentences.cn: 许多害虫对这种杀虫剂有抵抗力.

sentences.en: Spraying the area around buildings with an insecticide also prevents insect build up.
sentences.cn: 建筑物周围洒布杀虫药也能防止昆虫孳生.

sentences.en: Thanks to a new EU directive, insecticide labelling will be more specific.
sentences.cn: 根据欧盟的一项新指令，杀虫剂的标签标注将更加明确。

sentences.en: The airplane dusted the crops with an insecticide.
The gardener sprayed insecticide on the rose - bushes.
sentences.cn: 园丁给玫瑰丛喷上了杀虫剂.

sentences.en: The insecticide was put out of the child's reach.
sentences.cn: 杀虫剂放在孩子拿 不 到的地方.

sentences.en: The pad is impregnated with insecticide.

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance used for killing insects
